title: What are the 5 winning types of content marketing to grow your business? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would put them in the below order of priority Video MarketingBlog PostsNewslettersPodcastsCase StudieseBooksVideo Marketing Video Marketing is the best way to grow your reach as it is very easy for your customers to discern what you are trying to say. Video consumption is also very high among consumers, the trend is going to increase in the future. Focus on creating quality content for your customers in Video format and you will definitely see a boost in your Sales and Marketing efforts. Do check out my other answers where I talk in detail about Video Marketing. Answers on Video Marketing Blog Posts With blog posts, you have the liberty to cater to your niche audience by writing detailed articles on topics that matter to them. Before writing the blog, do good keyword research and try to include as many keywords as possible to rank well in SEO. Also, try to include images or GIFs so that your readers have some visuals instead of just reading text. You can also give out links to other websites and ask them for testimonials in return. This way you both will benefit. Newsletters Your customers have specifically requested to hear from you by subscribing to your newsletter. Don’t bore them with your product updates with every newsletter. Write about topics that will be useful for your customers or their end customers if they are providing services to others. It need not always be about your product, you can talk about the trending topics in your niche market. Best newsletters are those which are filled with humor, everyone loves that. With all serious emails piling in the inbox, a good laugh will definitely make your business stand out in customer's minds. Keep building your email subscriptions. In the current scenario, any social media can shut you down anytime. It is risky to depend only on social media, but the emails you collected will always stay with you irrespective of the platform you are using. Podcasts Podcasts have become very popular these days. Everyone is multitasking, your customers could be driving, cooking, working out, relaxing, etc. All they have to do is plug their earphones or speaker and they can hear from you. This way you can keep communicating with your audience and keep them engaged. The best way to add value in podcasts is by inviting industry experts onto your podcasts. This way your audience will find value in your podcast and you will be seen as an equal to the expert. Case Studies Case Studies are like testimonials, your customers can clearly see how their competitors or businesses in similar space have used your product and benefited. Numbers are very important, simple graphs with the most important KPIs would be perfect for your customers to arrive at the value proposition of your product/service. Don’t make it too long as well, put yourself in your customer's shoes and think of what info you might be looking for and include those, rest all details can be ignored. Give them a clear picture of how they can use your product/service specifically for their business. eBooks eBooks make it easy for your users to read about the topic in detail. The key here is to keep the eBook interesting, don’t make it a boring text dump. Include graphs, quotes, testimonials, stats from reliable sources, and keep your audience engaged till the end. You want them to go through all the points you want to talk about. You can also use eBooks as a lead-gen tool also, you send eBooks only to those who have given their email.

Thanks for A2A! Alright! Winning types of content marketing? Every content reaches the audience without any lag which when marketed precisely. Every content marketing has its own strategy to reach the target audience. It depends upon the business type and the number of audiences. Though I have a list of content marketing types to focus upon, I will be mentioned here in the top 5 on my list. Infographics  Source: Google One of the best content marketing types to reach and engage your audience. Irrespective of your business type, customers will get attracted to the images or infographics you use. Instead of making paragraphs, make it short and precise, and present it in an infographic. Surely, you would feel the rise in the number of visitors and customers Ebooks  Source: Google Ebooks are the next amazing way to market your products through content. Among the other forms, ebooks seem to be the trust-building medium for the customers. You can try writing or providing ebooks to your customers in order to make your relationship stronger than before. Blogging  Source: Google Blogging is the content marketing type that helps you to spread information in the form of long articles, short blogs, etc. Many popular brands have been using blogging as an amazing option to market their content and make their product an outstanding one in your customers’ minds. Podcasts  Source: Google Podcasts can be classified into two types. They are, Start your own podcastGet interviewed on someone else’s podcastEither way, starting your own podcast will help you to lift up the brand awareness for your products and services. Content marketing through podcasts seems an attractive way to bring in your customers to your track. Webinar  Source: Google Webinar seems another amazing content marketing type that helps your customers to come out of the boredom video tutorials. Instead of making them glued, try out webinars to make the session live and interact with your customers. Bonus time!!! I am listing out the key components to eye upon that help you to come up with a great content marketing strategy. Keep the target audience in mindMake the content as engaging as possibleChoose the right format as not all the styles suit your audienceUse metrics effectively to evaluate the progress of your strategySo, I am done with my answer!! Now, it's your turn to tune your content marketing strategy and work accordingly. Cheers!!
